identification.name: ${project.name}
identification.description: (Static) Scheduler Binding Component connecting to scheduling capabilities powered by OpenSymphony Quartz

config:Property.name: PollerCount
config:Property.displayDescription: Number of threads listening on NMR (ex. to process ACKs).

config:Property.name: QuartzThreadCount
config:Property.displayDescription: Size of Quartz Scheduler Thread Pool to process triggers.

config:Property.name: UseQuartzRAMJobStore
config:Property.displayDescription: You can choose Quartz RAM JobStore for speed, if not using GlassFish Clustering

config:Property.name: QuartzPersistentJobStoreJNDIURL
config:Property.displayDescription: If not using Quartz RAM JobStore, specify JNDI JDBC URL to database used for persisting JobStore
config:Property.defaultValue: <Must specify JNDI JDBC URL if not using RAM JobStore>

config:Property.name: configurationName
config:Property.displayDescription: Name of the Application Configuration object
